member.name: IMFTrustedInput.GetInputTrustAuthority
member.summary: Retrieves the input trust authority (ITA) for a specified stream. If the specified stream is not protected, this method must return MF_E_NOT_PROTECTED.
member.param: The stream identifier for which the ITA is being requested.
The interface identifier (IID) of the interface being requested. Currently the only supported value is IID_IMFInputTrustAuthority.
Receives a pointer to the ITA's IUnknown interface. The caller must release the interface.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The ITA does not expose the requested interface.
The specified stream is not protected.

member.name: IMFTrustedInput
member.summary: Implemented by components that provide input trust authorities (ITAs). This interface is used to get the ITA for each of the component's streams.
